cause.description:
We have worked with various orphanages all over India and have started an orphanage in South India. There are many ways to help these kids. We take several trips a year to provide assistance and encouragement to the orphans and staff workers. Prayerfully consider going or supporting the orphans from here. Give by going, go by giving.
Christmas With An Orphan 2007:
Dates: Dec 20-31 Cost: $3000 (don't worry, we have fund raisers planned) Cities: Delhi, Kota, Jaipur, Agra
Call Us If You Are Interested!!!
1. There are 80 million orphaned and abandoned children in India.
2. Everyone needs an opportunity to make something with their life.
3. Without outside help, most orphans will never have a chance of a life outside of poverty.
cause.mission: To rescue and care for the orphaned and abandoned children of India
cause.name: No Longer Orphans
